<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Subtle Theft](/Feats.aspx?ID=5220) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="General" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=78" />
<trait label="Skill" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=144" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 263 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Prerequisites**
Trained in [Thievery](/Skills.aspx?ID=17)

</column>

---

When you successfully Steal something, observers (creatures other than the creature you stole from) take a –2 circumstance penalty to their Perception DCs to detect your theft. Additionally, if you first Create a Diversion using Deception, taking a single Palm an Object or Steal action doesn’t end your undetected condition.
name: Subtle Theft
